name: Sagen MI Canada Inc. Class A Preferred Shares Series 1
longDescription: Sagen MI Canada Inc private sector residential mortgage insurer in Canada. The Company provides mortgage default insurance to Canadian residential mortgage lenders, making homeownership more accessible to first-time homebuyers. The company operates exclusively in Canada, with roughly half its policies in Ontario and remaining policies in Alberta, British Columbia, Quebec and Other.

fullAddress: 2060 Winston Park Drive,Suite 300, Oakville, ON, CA
